name: The Defending Shadow
description:
Welcome to my first and very long game. Its an RPG game. Its a mystery game that is all up to your choices. It is a difficult game. A lot of hidden things needed to be found. So it will never get boring. The first three files (Game file and two data files) all need to go into one folder. Then you download the 4th file and complete the setup. It will then allow you to play the RPG game. I hope you enjoy. If there are any further questions Please email me at:

wardella123@gmail.com

Also go and check out our website. It has the entire Story of the Game. I hope you consider Buying this game. It will deffenetly satisfy you!!

http://acrpg.my-free.website/
